common.failedToLoadHotelList: Yehlulekile ukulayisha uhlu lwamahhotela. Ngicela uzame futhi.
common.callToActionsDescription: Imibono emihle ayihlali isikhathi eside. Bhukha uhambo lwakho lweHoteloza namuhla!
common.errorLoadingData: Kube nephutha ngesikhathi kulayishwa idatha. Ngicela uzame futhi ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.
common.errorLandmarkNotFound: Iphutha: Indawo yomlando ayitholakali ku-URL. Ayikwazi ukulayisha.
common.findTopRatedStays: Thola izindawo zokuhlala ezilinganiselwe kakhulu ezinezintandokazi ezifanayo eduze nendawo oya kuyo

hotelSinglePage.defaultSchemaDescription: Bhukha {formattedHotel}, ihhotela lokunethezeka e {formattedCity} lonyaka {currentYear} kuHoteloza.

landmarkList.noNearbyPlacesFound: Azikho izindawo eziseduze ezitholakale ngaphakathi kwe {radius} km.

footer.hotelozaFooterText: I-Hoteloza iyipulatifomu ehamba phambili yokubhukha amahhotela kalula nangaphandle kwezinkinga. Senza lula ukusesha kwakho indawo yokuhlala ephelele, sinikeza ukukhetha okuhlukahlukene kwezindawo zokuhlala, kusukela kumahhotela akhululekile kuya ezindaweni zokungcebeleka zikanokusho. Jabulela kalula ukubhukha, amadili akhethekile, namasevisi aqondene nezidingo zakho zokuhamba. Bhukha ngeHoteloza futhi wenze uhambo olungasoze lwalibaleka lube ngokoqobo.

metadata.homePageDescription: Thola amahhotela angcono kakhulu nendawo yokuhlala ohambweni lwakho olulandelayo. Bhukha manje ngeHoteloza!
metadata.searchResultPageDescription: Sesha futhi ubhukhe amahhotela e {cityName}. Qhathanisa izintengo nezinsiza zokuhlala kwakho okuhamba phambili.
metadata.cityPageDescription: Thola amahhotela angcono kakhulu e {cityName} futhi uthole amadili angcono kakhulu ohambweni lwakho olungasoze lwalibaleka ngeHoteloza.
metadata.categoryPageTitleTemplate: Izaphulelo {formattedCategory} Ezihamba Phambili {currentYear} - Yonga Kakhulu eHoteloza!
metadata.categoryPageDescriptionTemplate: Thola {formattedCategory} ehamba phambili ku {currentYear} ngeHoteloza. Jabulela izaphulelo ezikhethekile, amanani amahle, nezinsiza ezisezingeni eliphezulu. Bhukha manje ukuze uthole ukuhlala okungasoze kwalibaleka!
metadata.categoryOgDescriptionTemplate: Hlola {formattedCategory} aphezulu onyaka {currentYear} kuHoteloza. Bhukha manje ukuze uthole amadili akhethekile nezinsiza eziphezulu!
metadata.categoryWebPageDescriptionTemplate: Thola {formattedCategory} aphezulu onyaka {currentYear} kuHoteloza ngamadili akhethekile nezinsiza eziphezulu.
metadata.countryNotFoundDescription: Isigaba, izwe, noma isifundazwe osiseshayo asitholakalanga kuHoteloza.
metadata.countryPageDescriptionTemplate: Thola {formattedCategory} ehamba phambili e {formattedCountry} lonyaka {currentYear} kuHoteloza. Jabulela amadili akhethekile, amanani athengekayo, nezinsiza ezisezingeni eliphezulu. Amadili anqunyelwe ‚Äì bhukha indawo yakho yokuhlala namuhla!
metadata.countryOgDescriptionTemplate: Thola ama {formattedCategory} angcono kakhulu e {formattedCountry} lonyaka {currentYear} kuHoteloza. Bhukha manje ukuze uthole amahhotela aphezulu namadili akhethekile!
metadata.stateNotFoundDescription: Isigaba, izwe, noma isifundazwe osiseshayo asitholakalanga kuHoteloza.
metadata.statePageTitleTemplate: Amahhotela {formattedCategory} Ashibhile e {formattedState}, {formattedCountry} {currentYear} - Bhukha Manje! | Hoteloza
metadata.statePageDescriptionTemplate: Thola {formattedCategory} ehamba phambili e {formattedState}, {formattedCountry} lonyaka {currentYear} kuHoteloza. Amadili akhethekile, amanani amahle, nezinsiza ezisezingeni eliphezulu. Bhukha indawo yakho yokuhlala engasoze yalibaleka!
metadata.stateOgDescriptionTemplate: Thola {formattedCategory} aphezulu e {formattedState}, {formattedCountry} lonyaka {currentYear} kuHoteloza. Bhukha manje ukuze uthole amadili akhethekile nezinsiza eziphezulu!
metadata.cityNotFoundDescription: Isigaba, izwe, isifundazwe, noma idolobha osiseshayo asitholakalanga kuHoteloza.
metadata.cityPageTitleTemplate: Amahhotela {formattedCategory} Ashibhile e {formattedCity}, {formattedState}, {formattedCountry} {currentYear} - Izaphulelo Ezinkulu! | Hoteloza
metadata.cityPageDescriptionTemplate: Thola {formattedCategory} ehamba phambili e {formattedCity}, {formattedState}, {formattedCountry} lonyaka {currentYear} kuHoteloza. Izaphulelo ezikhethekile, izinsiza eziphezulu, namanani angenakuqhathaniswa. Bhukha indawo yakho yokuhlala yamaphupho manje!
metadata.cityOgDescriptionTemplate: Thola {formattedCategory} aphezulu e {formattedCity}, {formattedState}, {formattedCountry} lonyaka {currentYear} kuHoteloza. Bhukha manje ukuze uthole amadili akhethekile nezinsiza eziphezulu!
metadata.hotelPageDescriptionTemplate: Bhukha indawo yakho yokuhlala e {hotelTitle} e {city}, {state}, {country}. Thola amadili angcono kakhulu, izinsiza, nezibuyekezo ukuze uthole okuhlangenwe nakho okungasoze kwalibaleka ngeHoteloza.
metadata.hotelOgDescriptionTemplate: Thola amadili angcono kakhulu e {hotelTitle} ngeHoteloza.

landmarkPage.description: {category} {landmarkName} inikeza indawo yokuhlala ehamba phambili e {cityName}, ngamadili amahle nezinsiza ezifana ne-WiFi yamahhala.
landmarkPage.serverErrorFetchingData: Iphutha leseva ngesikhathi kuthathwa idatha yehhotela.

homepage.unforgettableSpots: Izindawo ezingasoze zalibaleka ozofuna ukuzihlolela futhi
homepage.whatOurGuestsTrulyLoveAboutUs: Lokho Izivakashi Zethu Ezikuthanda Ngathi Ngempela
homepage.experienceTheMagic: Izwa umlingo oqhubeka uletha izigidi zabantu emuva. KuHoteloza, sizibophezele ekwenzeni konke ukuhlala kungasoze kwalibaleka, kalula, ngokucophelela, nangokusebenzisa okukhethekile.
homepage.hotelozaHeroSubtitle: Hlola izinkulungwane zamahhotela emhlabeni jikelele ngeHoteloza

about.popularDestinationsOffer: Lezi zindawo ezidumile zokuhamba ziningi ezikunikezayo
about.aboutHotelozaParagraph1: I-Hoteloza iyindawo yakho yokunethezeka, enikeza ukwamukela okungenakuqhathaniswa enhliziyweni yezindawo ezimnandi. Amahhotela ethu ahlanganisa ubuhle besimanje nokunethezeka okungapheli, aqinisekisa ukuthi konke ukuhlala kuyinto engasoze yalibaleka.
about.aboutHotelozaParagraph2: Gxila ezinsizakalweni zethu ezisezingeni lomhlaba, kusukela kuma-spas azolile kuya ekudleni okumnandi, bese uhlola izindawo ezikhangayo eziseduze ezenza konke ukuvakasha kungasoze kwalibaleka. Kungakhathaliseki ukuthi kungenxa yebhizinisi noma ukuzijabulisa, iHoteloza iyikhaya lakho kude nekhaya.

blockGuide.bestPriceGuaranteeText: Thola indawo yakho yokuhlala ephelele ngentengo engcono kakhulu ‚Äì okuqinisekisiwe. Azikho izimali ezifihliwe, ukonga kwangempela kuphela isikhathi ngasinye lapho ubhukha khona.
blockGuide.easyQuickBookingText: Bhukha ihhotela lakho lamaphupho ngokuchofoza okumbalwa nje. Okusheshayo, okulula, nokungenazinkinga ‚Äì ukuhamba kwakho okulandelayo kuqala lapha.
blockGuide.customerSupportText: Udinga usizo? Ithimba lethu labasekeli liyatholakala ubusuku nemini ukuze likusize ‚Äì noma kuphi nanoma nini lapho uludinga khona.

contactPage.heroSubtitle: Silapha ukuze sikusize futhi siphendule noma imiphi imibuzo ongaba nayo.
contactPage.getInTouchDescription: Zizwe ukhululekile ukuxhumana nathi nganoma yimiphi imibuzo noma ukukhathazeka. Ithimba lethu lihlala likulungele ukukusiza.

testimonials.sarahMQuote: I-Hoteloza iyishintshi yomdlalo! Ngithole amadili amahhotela angcono kakhulu lapha njalo. Ngempela iyona webhusayithi ehamba phambili emhlabeni jikelele yokukhangisa amahhotela.

data.name: USarah Miller
data.text: Ukuhlala kwethu lapha bekukuhle kakhulu! Indawo ihlelekile, igumbi belihlanzekile futhi likhululekile, futhi inkonzo yabasebenzi ibinobungane kakhulu. Kunconywa kakhulu iholide lomndeni.

data.name: UJohn Davis
data.text: Leli hhotela beliyisinqumo esihle kakhulu sohambo lwami lwebhizinisi. Izinsiza eziphelele, i-Wi-Fi esheshayo, futhi eduze nendawo ephakathi nedolobha. Lilungele kahle futhi likhululekile.

data.name: UEmily White
data.text: Ngithanda umklamo wangaphakathi wesimanje futhi omuhle we-Instagram! Ulungele ukuhlala nabangani. Intengo nayo iyakwazi ukuthengeka ngekhwalithi enhle kangaka.

data.name: UDavid Lee
data.text: Ukubuka kusuka egumbini bekukuhle kakhulu! Ngikwazile ukuthola izithombe eziningi ezinhle. Abasebenzi nabo bebehluleka ukuncoma izindawo zokuvakasha.

data2.name: U-Olivia Grace
data2.text: "Leli hhotela lilungele ukuthola ukuthula nokuzola. Umoya ozolile, amagumbi athulile, nabasebenzi abaphendulayo bangivumelile ukuba ngigxile ekubhaleni ngaphandle kokuphazamiseka. Kunconywa kakhulu."

data2.name: UDaniel Kim
data2.text: "Ukuxhumana okuqinile kwe-inthanethi nendawo yokusebenza ekhululekile kuyinto enkulu lapha. Ngikwazile ukusebenza nokuhamba ngesikhathi esifanayo. Indawo nayo iseduze namakhefi amaningi."

data2.name: USophia Brown
data2.text: "Inkonzo enobungane nezinsiza ezilungile zabantu abadala zasenza sazizwa sikhululekile kakhulu. Ibhulakufesi nalo belimnandi futhi lihluka. Sizobuya nakanjani."

data2.name: UMichael Chen
data2.text: "Njengompheki, ngikwazisa ngempela ikhwalithi yokudla kule ndawo yokudlela yehhotela. Izitsha zimnandi futhi izinketho zemenyu ziningi. Okuhlangenwe nakho okumangalisayo kakhulu kokupheka!"

data2.name: UChloe Wilson
data2.text: "Umklamo wangaphakathi wehhotela omuhle nokukhanya okuhle kwasekele ngempela ubuhlakani bami. Izindawo eziningi ezithakazelisayo zokuthwebula izithombe! Igumbi nalo belihlanzekile kakhulu."

data3.name: UJames Taylor
data3.text: "Le ndawo yokuphumula inokubukeka okuhle kakhulu kolwandle. Ilungele ukuphumula emkhubeni. Izinsiza zechibi lokubhukuda elingapheli nazo ziyamangalisa."

data3.name: U-Isabella Rodriguez
data3.text: "Iholide lethu lomndeni lapha belingasoze lalibaleka. Kwakukhona imisebenzi eminingi yezingane, futhi abasebenzi babe nobungane kakhulu futhi belulekile. Izingane zazithanda ukudlala olwandle oluyimfihlo."

data3.name: ULiam Garcia
data3.text: "Le ndawo iyindawo yokubalekela ekahle ukuze uphumule. Izinsiza ze-spa eziduduzayo nomoya onokuthula zangenza ngazizwa ngivuseleleke ngokuphelele."

data3.name: UMia Martinez
data3.text: "Ngihamba njalo ngomsebenzi, futhi le ndawo yokuphumula inikeza ukunethezeka kokuba sekhaya. Isevisi yasegumbini iyashesha futhi inobungcweti. Izoba yisinqumo sami esivamile."

data3.name: UNoah Thompson
data3.text: "Ukugqugquzela kuvela yonke indawo, futhi le ndawo yokuphumula igcwele ubuhle bemvelo obumangalisayo. Ngipende kakhulu lapha. Kunconywa kakhulu kubaculi noma kunoma ubani ofuna ukugqugquzela."

hotel.facilitiesAnswer: Izinsiza ku {title} zifaka i-Wi-Fi yamahhala, ichibi lokubhukuda, indawo yokupaka, nokuningi. Xhumana nendawo ukuze uthole uhlu oluphelele lwezinsiza.
hotel.breakfastAnswer: Yebo, ibhulakufesi lifakiwe ekuhlaleni kwakho ku {title}.
hotel.checkInCheckOutAnswer: Isikhathi sokungena kusuka ku-2 PM, kanti ukuphuma kungu-12 PM ku {title}.
hotel.parkingFacilityAnswer: Yebo, indawo yokupaka iyatholakala ezivakashini ku {title}.
hotel.smokingAllowedAnswer: Cha, ukuqhumisa akuvunyelwe kuzo zonke izindawo ze {title}.
hotel.airportTransportationAnswer: Yebo, ezokuthutha esikhumulweni sezindiza zingahlelwa ku {title} ngemali eyengeziwe.
hotel.cancellationPolicyAnswer: Ukukhansela kungenziwa kufika emahoreni angama-24 ngaphambi kokungena ngaphandle kwenkokhiso.
hotel.meetingFacilitiesAnswer: Yebo, {title} unamakamelo okuhlangana ahlome ngokuphelele atholakalayo ukuze ubhukhe.
hotel.attractionsNearAnswer: Izindawo ezikhangayo eziseduze ne {title} zifaka [uhlu lwezindawo ezikhangayo].

category.offeringsQuestion: Yiziphi izinhlobo zamandla atholakalayo ngaphakathi kwesigaba {category}?
category.offeringsAnswer: Ulungele ukuhlola izinhlobonhlobo zezinketho? Isigaba sethu {category} sifaka yonke into kusukela kokuhlangenwe nakho okukhethekile kwe-premium kuya ezixazululweni ezihlakaniphile, ezonga isabelomali. Thola okufanelekile ukuze ufeze amaphupho akho okuhamba noma izidingo ezithile!
category.familyFriendlyQuestion: Ingabe zikhona izinketho ezilungele umndeni ezitholakala kunketho yethu {category}?
category.familyFriendlyAnswer: Nakanjani! Siyaziqonda izidingo zakho. Thola izinketho eziningi {category} ezinconywe kakhulu imindeni, ziphelele ngezinsiza nemisebenzi eyakhelwe ukwenza izikhathi zakho nabathandekayo bakho zikhumbuleke futhi zikhululeke kakhulu!
category.mainAttractionsQuestion: Yiziphi izindawo ezikhangayo eziyinhloko noma izindawo ezidumile kakhulu eduze kwalezi zindawo {category}?
category.mainAttractionsAnswer: Izinketho zethu {category} azikho nje ngomkhiqizo/isevisi; zimalana nendawo! Jabulela ukufinyelela okulula ezindaweni ezidumile zezivakashi, izikhungo zokuzijabulisa ezijabulisayo, kanye nezindlela zokupheka okufanele uzizame. Khulisa ulwazi lwakho eBandung, West Java, noma kuphi lapho isigaba sakho {category} esikhethiwe sikuyisa khona!
category.luxuryAmenitiesQuestion: Ingabe ezinye izinketho {category} zinikeza izinsiza zikanokusho noma izici ezikhethekile?
category.luxuryAmenitiesAnswer: Ngempela! Gxila ekunethezekeni nasekunethezekeni. Eziningi zezinketho zethu {category} ziza nezinsiza zezinkanyezi ezinhlanu njengezindawo zokubhukuda ezizimele ezingapheli, amasevisi e-spa aphelele, izikhungo zokuqina zesimanjemanje, nokuningi. Zitholele ulwazi olungasoze lwalibaleka!
category.topRatedQuestion: Yiziphi izinketho {category} ezilinganiselwe kakhulu ezinezibuyekezo zamakhasimende ezinhle kakhulu?
category.topRatedAnswer: Ufuna okuhamba phambili? Nalu uhlu lwezinketho zethu {category} ezikhethwe phezulu, ezithandwa umphakathi wethu. Qinisekisa ikhwalithi nokwaneliseka, kusekelwe ubufakazi bangempela babasebenzisi!

city.typesOfHotelsAnswer: Hlola izinhlobonhlobo zamahhotela e {city}, kusukela kumahhotela okunethezeka kuya ezinkethweni ezonga isabelomali.
city.familyFriendlyHotelsQuestion: Ingabe kukhona amahhotela alungele imindeni e {city}?
city.familyFriendlyHotelsAnswer: Yebo, kunamahhotela amaningi alungele imindeni e {city}.
city.attractionsNearHotelsQuestion: Yiziphi izindawo ezikhangayo eziseduze namahhotela e {city}?
city.attractionsNearHotelsAnswer: Amahhotela e {city} aseduze nezindawo eziningi ezidumile ezikhangayo.
city.hotelsWithPoolsQuestion: Ingabe kukhona amahhotela anechibi lokubhukuda e {city}?
city.hotelsWithPoolsAnswer: Yebo, amahhotela amaningi e {city} afaka amachibi nokunye okutholakala.
city.bestRatedHotelsQuestion: Yiziphi amahhotela alinganiselwe kahle kakhulu e {city}?
city.bestRatedHotelsAnswer: Nawa amanye amahhotela alinganiselwe phezulu e {city}:

country.typesOfHotelsAnswer: Hlola izinhlobonhlobo zamahhotela e {country}, kusukela kumahhotela okunethezeka kuya ezinkethweni ezonga isabelomali.
country.familyFriendlyHotelsQuestion: Ingabe kukhona amahhotela alungele imindeni e {country}?
country.familyFriendlyHotelsAnswer: Yebo, kunamahhotela amaningi alungele imindeni e {country}.
country.attractionsNearHotelsQuestion: Yiziphi izindawo ezikhangayo eziseduze namahhotela e {country}?
country.attractionsNearHotelsAnswer: Amahhotela e {country} aseduze nezindawo eziningi ezidumile ezikhangayo.
country.hotelsWithPoolsQuestion: Ingabe kukhona amahhotela anechibi lokubhukuda e {country}?
country.hotelsWithPoolsAnswer: Yebo, amahhotela amaningi e {country} afaka amachibi nokunye okutholakala.
country.bestRatedHotelsQuestion: Yiziphi amahhotela alinganiselwe kahle kakhulu e {country}?
country.bestRatedHotelsAnswer: Nawa amanye amahhotela alinganiselwe phezulu e {country}:

landmark.typesOfHotelsQuestion: Yiziphi izinhlobo zamahhotela atholakalayo eduze kwe {landmark}?
landmark.typesOfHotelsAnswer: Eduze kwe {landmark}, uzothola izinhlobonhlobo zezinketho zokuhlala, kusukela kumahhotela okunethezeka kakhulu kuya ezindaweni zokuhlala ezikhululekile nezithengekayo. Kungakhathaliseki ukuthi ufuna ukuvakasha okusheshayo noma ukuhlola okude, kunehhotela elihle kakhulu lalo lonke uhlobo.
landmark.familyFriendlyHotelsQuestion: Ingabe kukhona amahhotela alungele imindeni eduze kwe {landmark}?
landmark.familyFriendlyHotelsAnswer: Nakanjani! Amahhotela amaningi eduze kwe {landmark} ahlome kahle imindeni, anikeza izinsiza ezifana namagumbi omndeni avulekile, amaklabhu ezingane, namachibi okubhukuda. Anikeza isisekelo esikhululekile sokuhlola indawo yomlando nezindawo ezizungezile nabathandekayo bakho.
landmark.attractionsNearHotelsQuestion: Yiziphi izindawo ezikhangayo eziseduze namahhotela eduze kwe {landmark}?
landmark.attractionsNearHotelsAnswer: Amahhotela eduze kwe {landmark} anikeza lula okungenakuqhathaniswa kokuvakashela indawo yomlando ngokwayo. Ngaphandle kwalokho, avame ukubekwa ngokuqondile eduze nezinye izindawo ezidumile ezikhangayo, iminyuziyamu, izindawo zokudlela, nezindawo zokuzijabulisa, okwenza ukuhlola kwakho kube lula.
landmark.hotelsWithPoolsQuestion: Ingabe kukhona amahhotela anechibi lokubhukuda eduze kwe {landmark}?
landmark.hotelsWithPoolsAnswer: Yebo, amahhotela amaningi atholakala eduze kwe {landmark} afaka amachibi okubhukuda aqabulayo, alungele ukuphumula ngemuva kosuku lokuvakasha. Amanye anenamachibi ophahla anokubukeka okumangalisayo kwendawo yomlando noma umbono wedolobha.
landmark.bestRatedHotelsQuestion: Yiziphi amahhotela alinganiselwe kahle kakhulu eduze kwe {landmark}?
landmark.bestRatedHotelsAnswerDefault: Okwamanje, asinakho idatha ethile elinganiselwe kakhulu etholakalayo yamahhotela eduze kwe {landmark}. Kodwa-ke, ungabheka izinhlobonhlobo zezinketho ezilinganiselwe kakhulu endaweni ebanzi.
landmark.bestRatedHotelsAnswerWithData: Ngokusekelwe ezibuyekezweni zezivakashi, amanye amahhotela alinganiselwe kakhulu eduze kwe {landmark} afaka:
